sentences.en: A, thought up, obey Ji's school rules in the school , behavior morally upright, stability, condescension.
sentences.cn: 思想上, 遵守校纪校规, 为人正直, 稳定 、 谦虚.

sentences.en: Annabel and Midge passed without the condescension of hurrying their pace.
sentences.cn: 安娜博尔和米吉打这儿经过,倒也不屑于加快速度.

sentences.en: Despite its condescension toward the Bennet family, the letter begins to allay Elizabeth's prejudice against Darcy.
sentences.cn: 尽管这封信对班纳特家的态度很高傲, 但它开始消除伊丽莎白对达西的偏见.

sentences.en: Father told me how to conduct myself . Honesty, Condescension. Maybe this is the basal tenet.
sentences.cn: 从爸爸那里我学到做人的基本道理. 诚实, 谦虚. 可能这是每个人最起码应该有的.

sentences.en: He hated the white man's superiority and condescension.
sentences.cn: 他憎恨白人的优越感和恩赐态度.
他带着轻松而居高临下的神气微微一笑.

sentences.en: He talked easily of Botticelli, and spoke of Fra Angelico with a faint condescension.
sentences.cn: 谈起波提切利,他毫不费劲, 说到弗拉安基利科,他甚至带着点屈尊俯就的神气.
他的客气带有屈尊俯就的意味.

sentences.en: If he had, it would have been an act of condescension.
sentences.cn: 如果他那么做了, 那等于是一种屈尊就下的行为.

sentences.en: In part, it reflected racist condescension.
sentences.cn: 它部分地反映了一种俯就的种族主义观点.

sentences.en: Life three treasures: Condescension, the diligence add a thinking.
sentences.cn: 人生三件宝: 谦虚 、 勤奋加思考.

sentences.en: Philip was somewhat overpowered by the young gentleman's condescension.
sentences.cn: 菲利浦被这位年轻绅士那副屈尊的派头征服了.

sentences.en: She detected a note of condescension in the friendliest advances.
sentences.cn: 别人与她善意交谈时,她也觉得话里含有蔑视的味道.

sentences.en: The queen's condescension was intended to make us feel comfortable.
sentences.cn: 女王的屈尊行为是为了让我们感觉轻松一些.

sentences.en: There was a tinge of condescension in her greeting.
sentences.cn: 她的问候中带着一丝傲慢。

words.tran_cn: 谦逊的；故意屈尊的；有优越感的
